Class CommonUtilites

The Class CommonUtilites.

Author:
Carsten Fasold
Copyright 2012 GrandCentrix GmbH.
All rights reserved.
This class provides methods that are frequently used in other classes like the URL's for the communication with the PushMeBaby Server
